_comment: Creating a package.json file using the 'npm init' command

scripts._comment1: Adding a start script so that we can run the node server using the 'npm start' command. With the help of nodemon, the server auto-restarts everytime we make a change & save the file.
scripts._comment2: We can also add a start-server script but then we need to run the node server using the 'npm run start-server' command
